mc.name: Corrupt
mc.oracleText: Corrupt deals damage equal to the number of Swamps you control to target creature or player. You gain life equal to the damage dealt this way.
mc.printedText: Corrupt deals damage equal to the number of Swamps you control to target creature or player. You gain life equal to the damage dealt this way.
mc.flavorText: There are things beneath the murk for whom the bog is a stew, a thin broth in need of meat.

mc.name: Deathgreeter
mc.oracleText: Whenever another creature is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may gain 1 life.
mc.printedText: Whenever another creature is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may gain 1 life.
mc.flavorText: "The bones of allies grant wisdom. The bones of enemies grant strength. The bones of dragons grant life eternal."

mc.name: Drudge Skeletons
mc.oracleText: {B}: Regenerate Drudge Skeletons. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)
mc.printedText: {B}: Regenerate Drudge Skeletons.
mc.flavorText:
"The dead make good soldiers. They can't disobey orders, never surrender, and don't stop fighting when a random body part falls off."
--Nevinyrral, Necromancer's Handbook

mc.name: Elephant Guide

Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3.
When enchanted creature is put into a graveyard, put a 3/3 green Elephant creature token onto the battlefield.
mc.flavorText: Nature's strength outlives the strong.

mc.name: Faerie Macabre

Flying

mc.printedText:
Flying
Discard Faerie Macabre: Exile up to two target cards from graveyards.
mc.flavorText: The line between dream and death is gauzy and fragile. She leads those too near it from one side to the other.

mc.name: Fleshbag Marauder
mc.oracleText: When Fleshbag Marauder enters the battlefield, each player sacrifices a creature.
mc.printedText: When Fleshbag Marauder enters the battlefield, each player sacrifices a creature.
mc.flavorText: Grixis is a world where the only things found in abundance are death and decay. Corpses, whole or in part, are the standard currency among necromancers and demons.

mc.flavorText: "Words lie. People lie. The land tells the truth."

Enchant creature
Enchanted creature is a 0/4 Treefolk with no abilities.
mc.printedText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature is a 0/4 Treefolk with no abilities.
mc.flavorText: Bulgo paused, puzzled. What was that rustling sound, and why did he feel so stiff? And how could his feet be so thirsty?

mc.name: Liliana Vess
mc.oracleText:
+1: Target player discards a card.
-2: Search your library for a card, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it.
-8: Put all creature cards from all graveyards onto the battlefield under your control.

+1: Target player discards a card.
-2: Search your library for a card, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it.
-8: Put all creature cards in all graveyards onto the battlefield under your control.

mc.name: Mutilate
mc.oracleText: All creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn for each Swamp you control.
mc.printedText: All creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn for each Swamp you control.
mc.flavorText: Liliana developed a fondness for the moment when roaring becomes squealing.

mc.name: Nature's Lore
mc.oracleText: Search your library for a Forest card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
mc.printedText: Search your library for a Forest card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
mc.flavorText: Nature's secrets can be read on every tree, every branch, every leaf.

mc.name: Overrun
mc.oracleText: Creatures you control get +3/+3 and gain trample until end of turn. (If a creature you control would assign enough damage to its blockers to destroy them, you may have it assign the rest of its damage to defending player or planeswalker.)
mc.printedText: Creatures you control get +3/+3 and gain trample until end of turn.
mc.flavorText: Nature doesn't walk.

mc.name: Phyrexian Rager
mc.oracleText: When Phyrexian Rager enters the battlefield, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
mc.printedText: When Phyrexian Rager enters the battlefield, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
mc.flavorText: It takes no prisoners, but it keeps the choicest bits for Phyrexia.

mc.name: Plated Slagwurm
mc.oracleText: Plated Slagwurm can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.
mc.printedText: Plated Slagwurm can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.
mc.flavorText: Beneath the Tangle, the wurm tunnels stretch . . . wide as a stone's throw, long as forever, deep as you dare.
